about_the_game:
The death metal soundtrack to the cave painting action roguelike Stones of Sorrow. Contains two previous releases by Neoandertals.

Track List

  • 1. Birth of the Enemy of Man
  • 2. Neanderthals Were Master Butchers
  • 3. Defleshing The Cadaver Before Burial
  • 4. Sliced By Man
  • 5. The Mysterious Demise
  • 6. Rebirth Of An Ancient Menace
  • 7. Spawning Of Species
  • 8. Abolition
  • 9. Neo-Neanderthals Travelling Through Consumed Continents
  • 10. Brooding Over A Dead Breed

Line-up:

Track 1
Birth of the Enemy of Man (2014)
Rain Pohlak - bass and vocals
Sandra Vungi - drums

Tracks 2-10
Neanderthals Were Master Butchers (2007)
Rain Pohlak - bass and vocals
Roland Seer - drums
